title: Tomato Rice Stew
ingredients: 1 (13.5 ounce) can whole leaf spinach, drained
1 (14.5 ounce) can stewed tomatoes, drained and sliced
method: Step 1: In a large saucepan, mix the water, rice, potatoes, tomato paste, and tomato sauce. Stirring constantly, bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium, and stir in basil, sugar, salt, and bay leaves. Cook about 15 minutes, stirring often, until potatoes and rice are tender but firm.
Step 2: Mix spinach, stewed tomatoes, and lemon juice into the saucepan. Reduce heat, and simmer 15 minutes, or until rice has finished cooking and the mixture has thickened.
